Sentencas: A solid oxide electrolysis cell concept for reducing CO2 to CO was studied using a proton conducting mixed oxide - BaCe0.7Zr0.1Y0.1Yb0.06Zn0.04O3 (-) (delta) (BCZYYZ) as an electrolyte.
Titulo: Ce(Mn,Fe)O2-(La,Sr)(Fe,Mn)O3 composite as an active cathode for electrochemical reduction of CO2 in proton conducting solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The oxide composite mixture: Ce0.6Mn0.3Fe0.1O2-La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.9Mn0.1O3 (12.5-87.5 wt.%) was examined as enhancing catalyst electrode for CO2 reduction and proton oxidation reaction on the cathode side for avoiding coke formation.
Titulo: Ce(Mn,Fe)O2-(La,Sr)(Fe,Mn)O3 composite as an active cathode for electrochemical reduction of CO2 in proton conducting solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Here we demonstrate the successful electrochemical reduction of CO2 in proton conducting SOECs.
Titulo: Ce(Mn,Fe)O2-(La,Sr)(Fe,Mn)O3 composite as an active cathode for electrochemical reduction of CO2 in proton conducting solid oxide cells

Sentencas: During electrochemical reduction of CO2 at 700 degrees C, current densities as high as 0.5 A/cm(2) and 1 A/cm(2) at 1.3 V and 2.2 V respectively, were withdrawn even though the cell employed a 400 mu m thick BCZYYZ electrolyte support.
Titulo: Ce(Mn,Fe)O2-(La,Sr)(Fe,Mn)O3 composite as an active cathode for electrochemical reduction of CO2 in proton conducting solid oxide cells
